original_text: praising God and enjoying the favor of all the people. And the Lord added to their number daily those who were being saved.
korean_text: 하나님을 찬미하며 또 온 백성에게 칭송을 받으니 주께서 구원 받는 사람을 날마다 더하게 하시니라

sentences.original_text: and enjoying the favor of all the people
And the Lord added to their number daily
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 날마다 그 수에 더하시니
